description: A detailed description of a requirement for Employment and Social Development Canada to purchase 900 cable trays.
full_summary:
# Cabinet Cable Tray Bid Solicitation

## Call for Proposal Details

* **Bid Reference**: PW-22-01014413
* **Bid Posting Date**: November 23, 2022
* **Bid Closing Date**: December 8, 2022 at 14:00
* **Bid Category**: Goods and Services (Electrical Hardware and Supplies)

## Project Overview

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking supplies of 900 cable trays to be delivered to and installed at the Guy-Favreau Complex in Montreal, Quebec.

### Technical Requirements

* 875 cable trays for installation under work surfaces on floors 2, 3, 4, 5, 7 and 8
* 25 cable trays for installation in local 103

### Security Requirements

* The bid includes a security requirement, which must be met by the successful supplier.

## Supplier Eligibility

* The bid is open to suppliers who are not holders of Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60HN-16ELEC.
* New suppliers must first qualify for a SA, which is outlined in RFSA # E60HN-16ELEC on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS).

## Trade Agreements

This bid is subject to several trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Contact Information

For bid inquiries, please contact Julie Barrette at (343) 551-9889 or [julie.barrette@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.barrette@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca).

Note: The text was condensed to 400 words, with the most relevant information included. The text was rewritten to have a more professional tone and to follow standard Markdown formatting.  The French and English entries were combined, as the content was very similar. The notes section was removed and the security requirements were included in the technical requirements section. The trade agreements section was simplified by listing only the relevant agreements. The contact information section includes only the necessary details.
